The Big Fat Stone

Ano: 2014

IMDb ID: tt3618822

Classificação: 5.9

Sinopse: Big Fat Stone is a modern day tale about dreams coming true. It tells the story of Edward Rizzo: a homeless man who, simply by being at the right place at the right time, gets a chance at a new life. We join Rizzo on his emotional roller coaster in a story that will tug at your heart strings and thrill you with drama. We learn that in a single minute, in a single second, with a simple twist of fate, everything can change forever.—Anonymous
